column1: # IOGP (International Association of Oil and Gas Producers) Equipment Reliability Data
# Source: IOGP Report 434-Series Safety Performance Indicators and IOGP/OGP Report 434-2 Process Safety Events
# PUBLIC DOMAIN DATA - Published industry statistics free to use
#   - IOGP Report 456: Process Safety Recommended Practice
#   - UK HSE Offshore Hydrocarbon Release Statistics
#   - SINTEF Offshore Reliability Data (public summary data)
# PROCESS RELEASE FREQUENCIES (from UK HSE and IOGP statistics)
# Based on UK HSE Offshore Statistics 2001-2020
# FIRE AND EXPLOSION IGNITION PROBABILITIES (from IOGP Report 434-6)
# SAFETY SYSTEMS (from IEC 61508/61511 literature and IOGP/OGP data)
# SUBSEA EQUIPMENT (from IOGP/SINTEF Subsea Reliability Data)
# PIPELINE AND RISER SYSTEMS (from PARLOC and IOGP statistics)

column2: converted to per hour per km)

column1: # DRILLING EQUIPMENT (from IOGP Well Control Incident Data)
# OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY FREQUENCIES (from IOGP 2020 Safety Performance)
# Lost Time Injury Frequency (per million work hours)
